description:
MongoDB Prometheus Exporter Dashboard. 
Works well with https://github.com/dcu/mongodb_exporter

If you have the node_exporter running on the mongo instance, you will also get some useful alert panels related to disk io and cpu.

panels.description: See which node is currently acting as the primary, secondary, ...
panels.title: Member State

panels.description:
Timespan difference between newest and the oldest op in the Oplog collection.
vs
Current timestamp and oldest op in the Oplog collection
panels.title: Oplog Recovery Window

panels.description: The total size of all records in a collection
panels.title: Collection Size

panels.description: The total size in memory of all records in a collection
panels.title: Collection Size - Memory

panels.description: The top command provides operation count for each database collection
panels.title: Operations Count Rate

panels.description: The top command provides operation time, in seconds, for each database collection
panels.title: Operations Time Rate

title: MongoDB
